Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~bmos299 I am unclear how this can be Done when there is no evidence that it was done, nor published findings. Please have whoever did this add those findings here. After that is done this can be closed.

Action.author: bmos299
Action.body: ~ChristopherFerris we will add the artifacts from the work asap.

Action.author: suryalnvs
Action.body: I worked on this and came up with some recipes https://github.com/suryalnvs/chef which were designed to run on assigned nodes to launch the network. However, we are pursing other tools(docker swarm) instead of this approach.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: none of this is relevant now, but in future, we should not be tracking proprietary experiments in the Hyperledger JIRA.
